translations: [内科] 弓形体病，弓浆虫病

sentences.sentence: Toxoplasmosis while normally harmless to humans can hurt an unborn baby.
sentences.translation: 尽管弓浆虫病通常对人类是无害的，但却会伤害没有出生的婴儿。

sentences.sentence: The toxoplasmosis rewires your brain and it makes you less afraid of cats.
sentences.translation: 弓浆虫会影响你的大脑，减少你对老鼠的恐惧。
